title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description:
Define the project scope, goals, and requirements. Identify target users (beginner to advanced programmers), programming languages to support (Python, JavaScript, Java, C++, Ruby, PHP). Prioritize desired features such as interactive tutorials, challenges, code editing tools, error handling assistance, community forums, version control system integration, and code sharing functionality. Also consider mobile app support as a potential future feature.

Potential Features:
1. Interactive Tutorials - High
2. Challenges - High
3. Code Editing Tools - High
4. Error Handling Assistance - High
5. Community Forums - Medium (consider implementing real-time notifications for enhanced user engagement) - Updated: Adding a feature to allow users to customize their notification preferences.
6. Version Control System Integration - Medium (support Git and GitHub for starters)
7. Code Sharing Functionality - Increased to High priority (as it can facilitate learning, collaboration and code review) - Updated: Prioritize real-time code sharing functionality for immediate collaboration.
8. Mobile App Support - Medium (considering potential benefits for users on-the-go, make sure to address usability and performance issues) - Updated: Consider partnering with a mobile app development team early in the project timeline to ensure smooth implementation and user experience.
9. Performance Monitoring and Optimization - Moved from Low to Medium priority as it can impact overall product quality
10. Accessibility Compliance - Medium (ensure the platform is accessible to all users including those with disabilities) - Updated: Collaborate with accessibility experts to ensure platform meets or exceeds current standards.
11. Documentation and Knowledge Base - Low (create easy-to-understand documentation for various features of the platform, including tutorials)
12. Security Measures - High (implement robust security measures to protect user data)

title: System Architecture Design
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the frontend, backend, database, and infrastructure components.

title: Frontend Development
description: Develop the user interface and interactive components for the programming language sandbox.

title: Backend Development
description: Implement the server-side logic, including language execution, tutorial management, and challenge handling.

title: Database Design and Implementation
description: Design and implement the database schema for storing user data, tutorials, challenges, and other relevant information.

title: Infrastructure Setup and Deployment
description: Set up the necessary infrastructure for hosting the application, including servers, load balancers, and continuous integration/deployment pipelines.

title: Security and Compliance
description: Implement security measures to protect user data and ensure compliance with relevant regulations and industry standards.

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Develop and execute comprehensive test plans to ensure the application's functionality, usability, and performance.

title: Documentation and User Guides
description: Create comprehensive documentation, including user guides, API references, and developer documentation.
